attributes.action: asbo's is a need for something to do!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: anti social behaviour is is not about getting kids into trouble it is about spending a some money on community centres for them to do soemthing, all they need is somewhere to go, these less privileged children have no where to go and nothing to do, not everyone has the chance or money to help there children, the national lottery make so much money every week so why can't they fund these cities for these children who are not trouble makers but bored and have nothing or nowhere to go, instead of making there lives a misery make soething of there lives!!!
